ol.li: In main menu, select File Open option ([Ctrol+O] on Windows/Linux, [Cmd+O] on macOS) or click the Open button on the top toolbar.
Use the dialog that appears to select a TMX file from the file system.

conbody.p: Once the selected TMX file is open, you can:

ul.li:
Click on any text cell to begin editing. After making changes, you can either
Click outside the cell or press [Alt+Enter] to save your changes
Press the [ESC] key to cancel your changes
To add new units to the TMX file, select Edit Insert Translation Unit in main menu or click the Insert Translation Unit button from the top toolbar.

To delete one or more units:
Select the checkbox in the leftmost column of the editing window to mark the units that you want to remove
Select Edit Delete Selected Units in main menu or click the Delete Selected Units button on the top toolbar.
You can use the top-left checkbox to select/deselect all units at once.
Use the Filter Translation Units option to locate text in the file.
Use the Sort Translation Units option to display file entries sorted on a selected language.

conbody.p: After making changes to the TMX file, select File Save in main menu ([Ctrl+S] on Windows/Linux, [Cmd+S] on macOS) or click the Save button on the top toolbar to save your modifications.
